article_title: Join the SheKnows Town Hall on March 2

og.description:
Recently, SheKnows Media commissioned a national study of women's feelings about feminism and several other issues, which we'll be releasing later this month.

One result didn't surprise me at all: We care passionately about the topics that are shaping the 2016 election. Our concerns range from border control to Obamacare to same-sex marriage, and equal pay by law topped the list of issues women support on both sides of the aisle.
og.title: Join the SheKnows Town Hall on March 2

article_metadata.dc.title: Join the SheKnows Town Hall on March 2
